skills.name: Slash of Surging Tides
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\nIf an opposing character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C106]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122052]</color> attached, this character gains 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.\nIf an opposing character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>Mist Bubble Prison</color> attached, this character gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>. (Once per Round)
skills.description:
Deals 3 Hydro DMG.
If an opposing character has Frozen or Mist Bubble Prison attached, this character gains 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
